replicas.title: The replicas count
replicas.description: The number of replicas for this deployment

maxSurge.title: The max surge count
maxSurge.description: The maximum number of replicas to deploy over the current replicas limit

maxUnavailable.title: The max unavailable count
maxUnavailable.description: The maximum number of replicas to make unavailable when deploying newer replicas

imagePullSecrets.title: The image pull secrets
imagePullSecrets.description: The secrets used to pull images from private registries.

anyOf.title: The image pull secret
anyOf.description: The secret used to pull images from private registries.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.title: The schema of terminationGracePeriodSeconds
terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: The amount of seconds to wait before forcefully stopping the pod after entering the Terminating state.

containers.title: The schema of containers
containers.description: The containers to be created as part of this deployment.

name.title: The container
name.description: The name of the container to be created.

image.title: The docker image
image.description: The docker image to be used as template for the container.

repository.title: The docker image repository
repository.description: The image repository from where to pull it.

tag.title: The docker image tag
tag.description: The image tag to pull (i.e. latest).

args.title: The container args
args.description: The arguments to pass to the container entrypoint or the command, if a command is defined.

anyOf.title: The argument
anyOf.description: Argument to be passed to the container entrypoint or command.

command.title: The conainter commands
command.description: The command to be executed by the container.

anyOf.title: The command
anyOf.description: Command to be executed by the container.

env.title: The environment variables
env.description: Environment variables to be passed to the container.

name.title: The environment variable
name.description: The name of the environment variable.

value.title: The environment variable value
value.description: The value of the environment variable.

envFromSecret.title: The environment variables from secrets
envFromSecret.description: The environment variables to retrieve from secrets.

anyOf.title: The environment variables from secret
anyOf.description: The environment variables to retrieve from a certain secret.

secretName.title: The secret name
secretName.description: The name of the secret to retrieve environment variables from.

envs.title: The environment variables
envs.description: The environment variables to retrieve from the secret.

anyOf.title: The environment variable
anyOf.description: The environment variable to retrie from the secret.

name.title: The environment variable name
name.description: The name of the environment variable inside the container.

key.title: The secret key
key.description: The key from the secret to retrieve the environment variable from.

envFromConfigmap.title: The environment variables from configMaps
envFromConfigmap.description: The environment variables to retrieve from configMaps.

anyOf.title: The environment variables from configMap
anyOf.description: The environment variables to retrieve from a certain configMap.

configMapName.title: The configMap name
configMapName.description: The name of the configMap to retrieve environment variables from.

envs.title: The environment variables
envs.description: The environment variables to retrieve from the configMap.

anyOf.title: The environment variable
anyOf.description: The environment variable to retrie from the configMap.

name.title: The environment variable name
name.description: The name of the environment variable inside the container.

key.title: The configMap key
key.description: The key from the configMap to retrieve the environment variable from.

envFromFieldRef.title: The environment variables from field refs

ports.title: The container ports
ports.description: The container ports to forward to the outside.

name.title: The port name
name.description: The name of the port outside of the container.

containerPort.title: The container port
containerPort.description: The port of the container to forward outside of it.

requests.title: The container resources requests
requests.description: The soft limit for the resources used by the container

limits.title: The container resources limits
limits.description: The hard limit for the resources used by the container

volumeMounts.title: The volume mounts
volumeMounts.description: The volumes to be mounted inside the container.

anyOf.title: The volume mount
anyOf.description: The volume to be mounted inside the container.

name.title: The volume name
name.description: The name of the volume to mount.

mountPath.title: The mount path
mountPath.description: The path where to mount the volume inside the container.

subPath.title: The sub path
subPath.description: The sub directory to create and use inside the persistent volume.

anyOf.title: The volume
anyOf.description: The volume attach to the deployment instance.

typeName.title: The type name
typeName.description: The name of the object of the specified type.

items.title: ConfigMap or secret items
items.description: Array of configurations for volumes created from configMaps or secrets.

typeName.title: The type name
typeName.description: The name of the object of the specified type.
